# Todo + Pomodoro Timer — Electron + TypeScript

## Project Overview
Desktop app built with Electron + TypeScript featuring:
- Todo list with add / complete / delete tasks
- Pomodoro timer (25 min work, 5 min break)
- Link a task to the active Pomodoro session
- Sound notification on timer end
- Modern dark UI

## Tech Stack
- Electron
- TypeScript
- HTML/CSS (vanilla, no framework)

## Development
- `npm run dev` — start in development mode
- `npm run build` — compile TypeScript
- `npm start` — launch Electron app
